answers.text: A reference to a javascript file

questions-and-answers.explanation: All HTML documents must start with a <!DOCTYPE> declaration. The declaration is not an HTML tag. It is information to the browser about what document type to expect.

questions-and-answers.text: HTML is the language for describing the structure of Web pages.
questions-and-answers.explanation: HTML is the standard markup language for Web pages. With HTML you can create your own Website.
HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the code that is used to structure a web page and its content.

questions-and-answers.text: The ______ tag is used for headings
questions-and-answers.explanation: HTML headings are titles or subtitles that you want to display on a webpage. <h1> defines the most important heading.

questions-and-answers.text: Which of these are selectors in HTML?
questions-and-answers.explanation: CSS selectors are used to find (or select) the HTML elements you want to style. Simple selectors (select elements based on name, id, class)

questions-and-answers.text: CSS is a form of java language.
questions-and-answers.explanation: CSS is the language we use to style a Web page.

questions-and-answers.text: Which HTML tag is used to reference a link?
questions-and-answers.explanation: The <a> tag defines a hyperlink, which is used to link from one page to another.

questions-and-answers.text: Which of these is not an HTML tag? Select all that apply
questions-and-answers.explanation: The <select> element is used to create a drop-down list. The <style> tag is used to define style information (CSS) for a document.

questions-and-answers.text: Tables cannot be made using HTML
questions-and-answers.explanation: The <table> tag defines an HTML table. An HTML table consists of one <table> element and one or more <tr>, <th>, and <td> elements.

questions-and-answers.text: What is used to reference images in HTML?
questions-and-answers.explanation: The tag is used to embed an image in an HTML page.

questions-and-answers.text: Styling can be done in-line or in a css file.
questions-and-answers.explanation: The <style> tag is used to define style information (CSS) for a document.

questions-and-answers.text: What is used to create tables in Java?
questions-and-answers.explanation: The <table> tag defines an HTML table.

questions-and-answers.text: The ________ tag is used to collect user input.
questions-and-answers.explanation: The <form> tag is used to create an HTML form for user input.

questions-and-answers.text: Which symbol is used to comment out information in an HTML file?
questions-and-answers.explanation: HTML comments are not displayed in the browser, but they can help document your HTML source code. You can add comments to your HTML source by using the following syntax: <!-- Write your comments here -->
